title: BRIEF-Metals X Says Deeply Concerned About Tactics Employed By Activist Shareholder APAC Resources By Reuters
text:
© Reuters. BRIEF-Metals X Says Deeply Concerned About Tactics Employed By Activist Shareholder APAC Resources

Oct 18 (Reuters) - Metals X Ltd :

* AWARE THAT A MARKETING CO WORKING ON BEHALF OF APAC RESOURCES MADE CALLS TO SHAREHOLDERS OF CO IN REGARDS TO FORTHCOMING AGM

* DEEPLY CONCERNED ABOUT SOME OF TACTICS BEING EMPLOYED BY ACTIVIST SHAREHOLDER APAC RESOURCES AHEAD OF OCT 24 AGM

* APAC RESOURCES MARKETING CAMPAIGN IS NOT AN ACTION THAT HAS BEEN ORGANISED OR IMPLEMENTED BY METALS X

* NOTES THAT THERE HAS BEEN UNUSUAL TRADING IN CO'S SECURITIES OVER RECENT WEEKS, INCLUDING SUBSTANTIAL BUYING BY APAC RESOURCES

* "BOARD IS EXTREMELY CONCERNED REGARDING WHAT IT CONSIDERS TO BE EXCESSIVE CAMPAIGNING METHODS OF APAC RESOURCES"

* REITERATES CONCERNS OVER MISALIGNMENT OF STRATEGIC INTENTIONS OF APAC RESOURCES WITH CO'S OBJECTIVES & PLANS ON NIFTY COPPER OPERATIONS
description: BRIEF-Metals X  Says Deeply Concerned About Tactics Employed By Activist Shareholder APAC Resources
